website_summaries.verdict: The main feature here is definitely the adjustable interior, which gives you a large number of ways to configure the inside of the box.
pros: Constructed 100% from bamboo, along with latching/hinge hardware and a chain to hold the lid open
Spacing inside can be configured in numerous ways with sliding dividers
Comes with your choice of patterns on the lid
cons: Some of these arrive scratched or damaged
Reports that the dividers within the box do not fit into the slots very well

customer_reviews.title: Nice, until it started splitting apart!
customer_reviews.text: I was super happy with this at first. It seemed well made, and I loved that I could organize all my teas with the dividers. Then after just sitting on my counter for about 3 weeks I noticed the top had split! As I looked closer, the bottom has also started to pull off and the bottom has partially split. I live in a very dry climate so I can’t imagine the wood has swollen causing the splits, and I didn’t think bamboo would react that much to a change in humidity anyway. I have no idea why this happened, but it is really upsetting to have something break just sitting on the counter. Thankfully I can still return it.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoying my new tea box
customer_reviews.text: Great quality of wood, beautiful color! I absolutely love the fact that it is adjustable, it is one of the main reasons I purchased it in the first place. I finally have one place for my tea collection and it is lovely. The only reason I gave it a 4 star instead of 5 is because I wasn't able to install the little chain on the side that supposed to support the box when opening. The screws that came with the box were too small for the holes. It was not a bit deal for me but when I purchase something new, I expect it to be in perfect shape. I still love and enjoy the box very much!
customer_reviews.author: Gal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I love this box! It’s absolutely sturdy and very beautiful. Definitely great. It is lighter and smaller than i expected given that its made out of wood but i didn’t really look at the actual measurement or weight. I actually love the fact that it is very light weight but yet very sturdy. The only thing The price is a bit steep for this size of a box aside from that it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dina Kamel

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Perfect for Tea Bags
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea box. It's very well made with smooth wood and nice little slots that the dividers fit into smoothly. It's perfect for putting tea bags in and recycling boxes to save some space since I live in a small apartment, but am practically a tea addict. The latch is also works well for keeping the box closed. I got the blank top version just in case I ever want to store something other than tea inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Beat Up
customer_reviews.text: I guess the quality co tell guy wasn’t around. There is some writing on the front that won’t come off. I know wood will split, but there’s a big crack all the way across the top. Also, hinges on the back are crooked making the clasp in the front funky. I expected more. Thumbs down. I’ve been buying a lot on amazon and this is the first bust I’ve had. I guess it was bound to happen eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Josh ollar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift idea - more than just a tea caddy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a tea fan, but i bought the box that was plain on its top. I figured that if my recipient already has a tea caddy she can use this multi-task box for any and all kinds of storage. I love that the cubicles are movable and sturdy inside. This is great for desk items, pens for drawing, kitchen items (small) and more. i would highly recommend this for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: D. wood

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blank lid, but received a box with the "Teas" design. This would have been fine if the design hadn't been completely off center and crooked. Looking at other reviews, a number of people have had similar complaints about the designs not being centered. Although I didn't end up opening the shrink-wrap from the box, it didn't seem to be particularly sturdy, and I'd trust the reviews (and the photos!) that say this box is easily damaged. Ended up buying a similar tea box from The Bamboo Leaf, which was $10 more, but seemed much more well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A tangled mess no more!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this box specifically to organize all my “cords” and it works just perfectly! Plus it’s lovely to look at, so I’m proud to display it prominently... making it very convenient to use and store my cords! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: LuckyLindsi83

customer_reviews.title: My second one
customer_reviews.text: 1st one was quite nice, though did need more sanding on the dividers. 2nd one, is still nice, needed sanding on the dividers as well. But the latch on the second is upside down. Really, for the price they should be more uniform, fully sanded and really should include dividers for all slots.
customer_reviews.author: Weiand

customer_reviews.title: Customization on the fly is great!
customer_reviews.text: Pro: clean look, customizable, well made, Boe enough but small enough Con: if you take out one of the vertical pieces you can only have one big rectangle. I wish it came with a horizontal piece that is two columns wide, so this big space could be divided into two smaller areas.
customer_reviews.author: architecture student

customer_reviews.title: Good for inks
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my fountain pen inks (which would be much heavier than any tea), and it's holding up great. The partitions are also re-sizable which I really enjoy. Just one panel didn't fit exactly and had to be squeezed in, but don't really need it so it was extra for me. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Dawner

customer_reviews.title: Slots missing to complete divider...
customer_reviews.text: Missing slots, want to use all of the dividers but the only give you enough for 11 divided section when you should be able to have 16... Short 5 slots to complete so it a bit crazy that it doesn't have them. Maybe cost an extra 20 cents?
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, useful and nice value
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty lovely and being able to adjust the spaces is so useful and was difficult to find. I turned mine into my dream sewing box. If I could complain about something it's that some of the dividers were not perfectly finished but worked fine
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, awesome, awesome! Solid bamboo. Not veneer. Great craftsmanship. Very versatile and attractive storage solution! The dividers slide in easily but aren’t too loose.
customer_reviews.author: PDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Customization
customer_reviews.text: Love this box! It's easy to customize and store what I need in an organized fashion. My only complaint is that it doesnt come in different dimensions. I would love one that is deeper or larger overall because it has so many storage options.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: My box came in poor quality. The lid Was completely misaligned. It was pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built tea box
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this box. It has very clean lines and there is no smell to the bamboo. The adjustable slots are nicely spaced. I felt it was reasonably priced for the quality and usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: CalCat52

customer_reviews.title: Great storage Box.
customer_reviews.text: It will hold different size tea bags. Normal size facing forward. Extra large facing toward side of box. Looks nice. Can hold different size items. Easy to adjust wooden dividers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warped
customer_reviews.text: About a month after purchasing this, the lid has warped so much that the latch no longer closes. I was originally very pleased with the aesthetics and price of this box, but it’s effectively unusable now.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon L.

customer_reviews.title: nice looking box, looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my tea-loving husband. We have boxes of tea everywhere. This did organize some of our bags well. It is a nice looking box
customer_reviews.author: AmyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great box
customer_reviews.text: Box joints and dado slots for the customizable comaprments make this a great box. We use it for tea. It fits about 6 small boxes of tea. We bought a variety of brands and the typical size fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: angler80

customer_reviews.title: Great item for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few tea boxes and recipe boxes but I must admit I was very impressed when I opened the box for this item.....its built way better than I thought It would be and built of nice sturdy bamboo ....should last almost forever..... great item for great price.... would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MarkD54

customer_reviews.title: Built well & Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great box with many little removable dividers. Reccomend for tea, spices or incense storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to keep tons of tea in and keeps everything snuggly in place so even if you store it in its side like I do, when you open it, everything is still in perfect order.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy wood box!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a returned several boxes but this one is a keeper! Good sturdy wood, comes in a box so won’t get destroyed in shipping like others. I bought another because they are great! This is for storing my crystal collection!
customer_reviews.author: montanafosberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Holds my teabags and looks great! I think I’ll buy another!
customer_reviews.author: PookaD.

customer_reviews.title: I keep nail wipes in it
customer_reviews.text: Nail wipes are about the same size as tea bags so this works out perfectly for those.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Flame of Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tea organizer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tea storage! I love how I can adjust the size of the sections in the tray. Perfect for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Frances D

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I could store my planting seeds. It looks great, and there is so much room. You have to leave it open once you receive it to air it out. The smell goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Vella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tea bags
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this as a tea box. I had way too many boxes of different kinds of tea in my pantry, but when I put them in here, they were so well organized, and they all fit! Beautiful box and great space saver.
customer_reviews.author: Madilyn

customer_reviews.title: Sent back
customer_reviews.text: it looks pretty, its exactly what i needed to BUT, it arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL CANO

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: I used this for tea. It’s perfect. I love it that it’s adjustable
customer_reviews.author: L. Ebert

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and liked it so much that I kept it for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Useful and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Holds several kinds of tea bags. Attractive and simple design. Sturdy and useful
customer_reviews.author: Gerri C.

customer_reviews.title: love this box!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful box that I am using to keep my treasures and jewelry. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Holly R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully versatile!
customer_reviews.text: This has such an easy way to customize with the little shelves! Well made, and looks very clean and elegant. I may be buying more for gifts, and I need another one for myself. I'm going to upcycle it to use as a display case on my wall (for figurines and small souvenirs).
customer_reviews.author: ShopperKatie

customer_reviews.title: This would make a great hobby box
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these as a gift for my niece, and filled it with a selection of teas. I thought the box and the dividers seemed very solid, and I had no trouble moving the dividers around to get the configuration I wanted. This would make a great hobby box.
customer_reviews.author: M. Romer

customer_reviews.title: Handy organizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box to corral all my tea in one place. It is perfect. I love the adjustability. It is strong, yet lightweight. Super solid craftmanship. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my tea box!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this box for my tea. I love tea. My daughter saw it after I filled it and she said it was so cute. Made really well too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great to organize tea
customer_reviews.text: Love this for organizing my tea! As you can adjust the compartments, this worked well for tea bags as well as loose leaf teas.
customer_reviews.author: megan sims

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I've had this box about 5 months and it's falling apart. When I picked it up today I found the bottom has split and the lid has warped. It's been sitting on a shelf, inside my house, so temperature or humidity isn't a factor. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pete101

customer_reviews.title: Quite elegant
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice box and made very well. It actually looks a lot nicer than I expected. The wood is smooth and not warped or splintered. The dividers are easy to take in and out. My only disappointment was that it didn't come with a chain for the inside of the lid like the picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: It is okay
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, but the problem is, that it is cracked after just 1st week in a few places, you can't lock it any longer since the top is bent, it is not worth 30$ :(
customer_reviews.author: Oleg

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SERVICE.  HIGH QUALITY.  USEFUL.
customer_reviews.text: great use! i LOVE this. and i will buy another one for other group of things. go ahead buy this one. you WILL never find another one like this.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard A Jerfita

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Lovely crafted tea box. The company owners sent a nice note with it.
customer_reviews.author: The Van Wagners

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Works just as described.  Makes a lovely tea box!
customer_reviews.text: Great box. Nice color of wood. Easily adjustable spaces in the box. I used it for tea bags. Most are a snug fit. Could make the box slightly wider and have just a bit more room in the compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca E.

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice construction, holds my foil wrapped tea bags. Love that you can configure the cells of the box to meet your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my gaming dice, I plan to buy a couple more for different knick knacks. It's excellent value for the money and very customizable.
customer_reviews.author: Rawrs

customer_reviews.title: Looking for adjustable tea box
customer_reviews.text: Exterior quality is perfect. On the inside, however, some of the slots cut out for the movable slats are not even and makes it unusable in spots...this was fine for me because I intended to remove a couple for big tea pouches anyway.
customer_reviews.author: RCJH

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: It smells like chemicals/clear coat. Hopefully it will air out. Looks and works just like description.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Well made and person loved
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a Christmas gift. Well made and person loved it
customer_reviews.author: ribsy fishhook

customer_reviews.title: With the Box being bamboo it's easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love the blank box I actually have a wood burner that I'm going to change it up with and I love that the Tee Box is adjustable
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana I

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a broken chain
customer_reviews.text: The box itself was nice, but I returned it because the chain connected to the lid was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It’s only been a day and the hinge screws have sheared off and the cap is warped. :(. I am very disappointed in this box.
customer_reviews.author: billiesue

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks guys! Your product is outstanding! We are using it for organizing our team bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Riazi

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in the quality of the construction of this box
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the quality of the construction of this box. The various dividers were poorly constructed, and did not fit in the slots very well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize my tea bags!
customer_reviews.text: Loved that this product has movable inserts. The quality of the bamboo and wooden inserts is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschooling mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The box was much smaller than what I would have expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item damaged at construction yet finished and sold anyway
customer_reviews.text: A few problems but why i gave it 1 star was for knowingly shipping damaged goods. The chain between lid and base was attached twisted on the third attempt the first 2 attempts ended in a cut screw head sticking out and a hole that split the wood.
customer_reviews.author: W Geitner

product_meta.title: Multikeep Adjustable Tea Box 128 Tea Bag Storage Organizer Bamboo Latching Lid (Blank Lid)
feature_bullets: PERFECT GIFT: Blank lid means you can use it for virtually anything. Tea box, medicine, toys, collectibles--you name it. It's for everyone with things.
DIMENSIONS: 7.5 x 12.5 x 3.5 in 100% BAMBOO: Most tea boxes use a fake composite board bottom. Our tea box is 100% bamboo. It just feels much more solid & durable.
CUSTOMIZABLE: Configure the decorative box 500+ different ways with unique Multikeep slat system
GUARANTEED: 100% money back no questions asked guarantee.
LATCH: Latching lid ensures safe keeping and travel
